definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: 96 of the 100 most common English words are Germanic.
sentences.chinese: 英語中100個最常用詞中96個來自日耳曼語。

sentences.english: The languages of the countries in the north come mainly from the old German.
sentences.chinese: 北部國家的語言主要由古日耳曼語演變而來。

sentences.english: English is a West Germanic dialect.
There is a strong influence of Germanic languages and Romantic languages too.
sentences.chinese: 英語也受到日耳曼語和浪漫主義語言的強烈影響。
